title: Can't Unlink
body: So I'm trying to link my league account to my fb and it says it's already linked to an account, I don't remember linking my account to any fb accounts so was really hopeing someone could help me out thanks

replies.body: What happens when you try to unlink the other facebook account from inside the League client (after pressing *Add Friend*)?

point of clarification - is the problem that your league account is already linked to an unknown facebook account or your facebook account is linked to an unknown league account?  original post is a tad vague.
Yes, but only in the *add friend* section where it lists whether you've linked an account already. Can you [send me a screenshot](https://gyazo.com/) of what you're seeing?
